meanings.sent1: The new movie outgrosses all others at the box office.
meanings.sent2: Her lemonade stand outgrosses the competition in sales.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's piggy bank outgrosses her brother's in coins.
meanings.sent4: The sun outgrosses all the stars in brightness.
meanings.sent5: The champion outgrosses all opponents in skill and determination.

meanings.sent1: The tech company outgrosses its competitors in profits.
meanings.sent2: His bakery outgrosses other local businesses in revenue.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outgrosses the birds in nut gathering.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter outgrosses all other sounds in the room.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall outgrosses the stream in volume and power.
